author: billbarker
msg: Sanity check the output dump when debugging Ajp13.
The problem is that on read, 'len' includes the header, and on write it doesn't.  Now it won't try and dump past the end of the output.

author: billbarker
msg: Second half of the fix for 6515.
It seems that StaticInterceptor replicates code from the Facade.

author: billbarker
msg: Don't set DateHeaders if we are included.
The spec forbids setting headers on includes, but the DateHeaders slipped through.  This closes the hole.
